message.reasoning_content:
I need to respond to 10 statements about AI in education as a teacher from the United Arab Emirates. Let me think through each statement carefully:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - AGREE. AI tools can definitely help generate, organize, and improve lesson plans.

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - AGREE. AI can personalize content based on student performance and learning levels.

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - AGREE. AI can provide personalized feedback, tutoring, and support systems.

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs (e.g., multilingual learners, special education needs) - AGREE. AI can help with language translation, accessibility features, and personalized support.

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - STRONGLY AGREE. This is one of the clearest benefits - grading, attendance, record-keeping can all be automated.

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - AGREE. This is a real concern with AI tools that can generate text and content that students might plagiarize.

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - AGREE. AI can make errors, hallucinate, or provide inaccurate information.

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - AGREE. AI systems can perpetuate biases in their training data.

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - AGREE. This is a legitimate concern with data collection and storage.

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students - AGREE. AI may not understand proper pedagogical principles and could suggest inappropriate teaching methods.

Let me structure these responses properly.
